page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT IN SELSEY
page.content: Selsey is a very energetic place in the way of entertainment."The Good Old Days"is a good example,it is a group in Selsey which performs to the public. Ages range from about four on to ninety!Their shows are very entertaining, they are funny in some parts and serious in others.The money raised goes to good local causes. Another lively organisation is "The SCAMPS" it is a similar group to The Good Old Days. It is on every Christmas at the Manhood Community college. The money from Groups in Selsey and you can join at any age ranging from four to Adult! Local Art and Drama groups provide a very good opportunity for the people involved to express their talents.The Selsey Choral and Operatic Society are also very good at putting on shows!
